welcome.title: Continuum
welcome.subtitle: Resume your work, not your tabs.
welcome.description: A task-first browser that remembers context and lets you continue without interruption.
welcome.trustCue: No account required. Data stays on your device.

flowView.selectWorkspace: Select a workspace from the sidebar or create a new one to get started.
flowView.addPages: Add pages to this workspace to start working
flowView.workspaceRemember: This workspace will remember everything you do here.
flowView.reopenExactly: It will reopen exactly as you left it.

notes.title: Notes
notes.selectWorkspace: Select a Workspace to add notes
notes.emptyHint: Use this space to capture thoughts, summaries, or tasks for this workspace.

toast.restored: Restored exactly where you left off

restore.title: Restore last workspace
restore.description: Automatically open the workspace you were using last time.

autoArchive.title: Auto-Archive
autoArchive.description: Archive workspaces not accessed in 30 days.

linkHandling.title: Link Handling

linkHandling.description: When clicking a link in a note or chat.

setAsDefault.title: Set Continuum as your default browser?
setAsDefault.description:
Open links directly in your workspaces.
You can change this anytime.

manualHelp.title: Permission Request Failed
manualHelp.description:
MacOS may be blocking the request.
Please check System Settings > Desktop & Dock and select Continuum as your default web browser manually.

autoSave.title: Auto-save notes
autoSave.description: Save changes automatically as you type.

captureTitle.title: Capture Page Title

captureUrl.description: Automatically add the source URL to notes.

thirdPartyCookies.description: Prevent sites from tracking you across the web.

dnt.title: Send "Do Not Track" request

permissions.description: Control which sites can access your camera, microphone, and location.

mic.label: Microphone

location.label: Location

clearData.description: Clear cookies, cache, and history for all workspaces.
